create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts music visualizer
Primary request: Mid-section visual where questions become pathways to insight.
Scene/background: stylized tunnel of mirrors transforming into a library of light particles
Subject: abstract silhouette figures made of particles, open books morphing to waveforms
Action: 0-4s figure walks through mirrored uncertainty; 4-8s questions appear as abstract glyph trails; 8-12s trails converge into bright knowledge pulse
Camera: locked vertical frame with slow dolly and quick snap zooms on beats
Lighting/mood: moody shadows with glowing highlights and volumetric rays
Color palette: indigo, gold, teal, graphite
Style/format: contemporary trap aesthetic fused with spiritual futurism; abstract animation style
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack; no generated dialogue
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no text overlays, no real humans, no specific copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, motion jitter, text artifacts, logos, watermarks
